items.sentence: I tried really hard to convince Tom to help Mary.
Tom couldn\'t resist peeking through the keyhole.
I stayed up most of the night worrying about Tom.
I still feel like I have a lot to learn from Tom.
I still remember the way Tom used to look at you.
I suspect Tom and Mary are the ones who did that.
You should tell Tom you aren\'t planning to swim.
You shouldn\'t have done that without permission.
We believe that Tom killed Mary with an ice pick.
I don\'t want to have children. Is that abnormal?
